text: Arnold Jerrold "Jerry" Perenchio (December 20, 1930 â€“ May 23, 2017) was an American billionaire businessman and philanthropist. He was at one time the chairman and chief executive officer of Univision from 1992 through 2007. He was born in Fresno, California. Perenchio died of lung cancer at his Los Angeles, California home on May 23, 2017 at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *Forbes.com: Forbes World's Richest People *Business Profile Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Los Angeles Category:American billionaires Category:American philanthropists Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles
title: Jerry Perenchio
